contents: Article 37 (Business Operation Plan) ① After receiving the budget approval notice, the division budget manager prepares a business operation plan without delay and submits it to the budget manager, and the budget manager comprehensively deliberates and adjusts it and notifies it to the division budget manager., ② The Chairman of the Board of Directors shall submit the business operation plan referred to in Paragraph 1 to the Minister of Health and Welfare upon resolution by the Board of Directors within two months after establishing the budget. ③ If the budget is changed in accordance with the provisions of Article 41, the business operation plan shall be changed without delay. The provisions of paragraph 2 shall apply mutatis mutandis.
